chart_description: The 'I/O full pressure stall time' chart measures the length of time in milliseconds that I/O (input/output) operations are not served due to a lack of available resources.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: The amount of time blocked I/O operations spend waiting after the disk gets 10% full.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: The amount of time blocked I/O operations spend waiting after the disk gets 300% full.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: The amount of time blocked I/O operations spend waiting after the disk gets 60% full.
